rows.label: qev025104_MSG0001
rows.name:
You're late, yes?! Very very late!
Hurry up and pizza me NOW, right?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025104_MSG0002
rows.name:
Hmm? Are you pizza? If you're not pizza,
you are dead to me right now, yes?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025104_JNK0010
rows.name: Control

rows.label: qev025104_SEL0011
rows.name: Rein in your anger and hand over the pizza.

rows.label: qev025104_JNK0020
rows.name: Apologize

rows.label: qev025104_SEL0021
rows.name: Deliver the pizza with an apology for the delay.

rows.label: qev025104_MSG0003
rows.name:
Late late LATE! Is this some sick plot to starve me to
death or something?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025104_MSG0004
rows.name: And and what? No apology? Unbelievable![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025104_MSG0005
rows.name:
Late late LATE! Is this some sick plot to starve me to
death or something?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025104_MSG0006
rows.name:
Apologies won't ease my hunger, no! Do you have any
idea the panic I felt while while while waiting for this
flavor disk? No?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025104_MSG0007
rows.name:
Was this maybe an intentional snub?
Did you KNOW I love pizza more than life?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025104_MSG0008
rows.name:
...Oh, what? You have some complaint, right?
I am livid, aren't I?! Grudges over food last a lifetime,
can't they?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025104_MSG0009
rows.name:
I demand a a a discount! An apologetic discount full of
contrition and maybe percents off![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025104_JNK0030
rows.name: Rage

rows.label: qev025104_SEL0031
rows.name: Explode in the face of Mikkal's unreasonable demands.

rows.label: qev025104_JNK0040
rows.name: Endure

rows.label: qev025104_SEL0041
rows.name: Weather Mikkal's insane complaints.

rows.label: qev025104_MSG0010
rows.name:
ARRRRG! Is this because I'm Ma-non? Yes?!
Are you making light of me because we seem so
meek to you? You monster![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025104_MSG0011
rows.name:
That's it, right?! Just leave the pizza and get out!
GET OUT OUT OUT OUT![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025104_MSG0014
rows.name:
Why the silence? Do you think you can just tune me
out, maybe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025104_MSG0015
rows.name:
I see what this is... You're making light of me
because I'm Ma-non, yes?! Because we seem so meek
to you humans, right?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025104_MSG0016
rows.name:
Hah! I may be a slightly unhinged pizza addict,
but you're just a big jerk! Right?! Right![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025104_MSG0017
rows.name: Enough, yes?! Just leave the pizza and GET OUT![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025104_MSG0018
rows.name: And tell Powell to to to hire a better delivery minion![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025104_MSG0019
rows.name: So long! Off you go! Good-bye forever![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025104_MSG0020
rows.name: Phew... That's some good pizza, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025104_MSG0021
rows.name:
These grenade pizzas really take the edge off,
you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025104_MSG0022
rows.name:
Er, and uh... Sorry I sort of...flew off the handle there.
Hunger unleashes the beast, doesn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025104_MSG0023
rows.name:
Maybe it's the pizza's fault, perhaps? It seems it can
turn perfectly rational Ma-non into raving lunatics,
doesn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025104_MSG0024
rows.name: ...Urrrgh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025104_MSG0025
rows.name:
Think I might have...had too too much...grenade pizza
perhaps?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025104_MSG0026
rows.name: Must rest... Sleep pod...good...[ST:wait ]
